SELECT career_fair.fair_id as fairId, career_fair.title, career_fair.content, career_fair.start_time as startTime, career_fair.end_time as endTime, career_fair.location, career_fair.`host`, career_fair.`status`, school.school_name as schoolName FROM career_fair, school, enterprise_user WHERE career_fair.school_id = school.school_id AND user_id=#{userId} AND enterprise_user.enterprise_id=career_fair.enterprise_id
AND career_fair.`host` like concat('%',#{host},'%')
AND career_fair.location like concat('%',#{location},'%')
AND school_name like concat('%',#{schoolName},'%')
AND career_fair.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
